title: Andersonville National Historic Site: Historic Photos
body: Historic Photos       Â                 Historic Photos of Andersonville Prison   11 Photos  Photographer AJ Riddle visited Andersonville in August 1864 and took the only known photographs of the prison during its operation.            Thomas O'Dea's drawing of the Andersonville Prison   21 Photos  The Camp Sumter military prison as it appeared on August 1, 1864. This lithograph image was drawn from memory twenty years later.
